terminal.integrated.fontFamily: FiraMono NF, FiraCode Nerd Font Mono
markdown.preview.fontFamily: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe WPC', 'Segoe UI', system-ui, 'Ubuntu', 'Droid Sans', sans-serif
C_Cpp.clang_format_fallbackStyle: { BasedOnStyle: Google, UseTab: Always, IndentWidth: 4, TabWidth: 4, ColumnLimit: 120}

e.text: go to last char of last line

t.text: go to the first displayed line

c.text: go to the middle displayed line

b.text: go to the last displayed line

f.text: go to file whose name is selected

..text: go to last buffer modification position

e.text: extend to last char of last line

t.text: extend to the first displayed line

c.text: extend to the middle displayed line

b.text: extend to the last displayed line

f.text: extend to file whose name is selected

..text: extend to last buffer modification position

bindings.name: Show all buffers in active window
Show active file in tree/explorer view
Copy path of active file with line and column
Copy directory path of the active file
Copy path of active file with line
Copy relative path of active file with line and column
Copy relative directory path of the active file
Copy relative path of active file with line
Copy filename without extension of active file
Copy relative path of active file
Connect to REPL server for project
Toggle test coverage in current package
Search all references in side bar
Fuzzy search with selection in current buffer
Maximize window and hide side bar
